issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The problem is a duplicate of an existing issue.
resolution.name: Duplicate

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
As of YARN-4889, the behavior of AMRMClientImpl#getMatchingRequests has slightly changed.
After YARN-4889, the method will throw NPE if the method is called before calling addContainerRequest.

Hi [~sarutak], does this problem occur on trunk as well? If so, would you create a patch for trunk?
I found YARN-5753 resolved this issue for trunk but backport seems not to be done for branch-2.
Thank you for the information. I verified the commit of YARN-5753 on trunk can be cherry-picked to branch-2 cleanly, so I'll cherry-pick this.
Backported to branch-2. Closing this as duplicate. Thanks [~sarutak] for the report!
